Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Kinetic determination based on IFCC recommendations
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ENVOY 500 CK Reagent Kit for quantitative determination of creatine kinase in serum and plasma using the ENVOY 500 Chemistry System.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of creatine kinase (CK) in human serum and plasma using the ENVOY 500 Chemistry System; not intended for point of care use; aids in diagnosis and treatment of myocardial infarction and muscle diseases such as Duchenne-type muscular dystrophy.
